title: The Mallee Fowl
creator_credit: Peter Du Cane and David Moore
brief_description: Mallee Fowl are the most remarkable of the world’s mound-building birds. The male bird builds a huge conical mound like a compost heap, which acts as an incubator for hatching the eggs. This fascinating documentary looks at the life-style of this unusual bird.
